description:
Fuller is back after a long eight-month absence and he's put on more muscle!
He's been busy with school and being a personal trainer.
I hadn't heard from him in a while so I was pleasantly surprised when I received an e-mail from him, complete with pictures of him flexing naked in his bedroom.
He was always muscular before, but now he's certifiably buff!
He's got a lot of energy too, because he's a more aggressive fucker than before. He really fucks the shit out of Kurt!
title: Fuller & Kurt
